description: This trap will reports the auto provision result (success/failed). It contains the attributes it got from the DHCP server.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionStatus EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionResult i 1 EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionGateway a 192.0.2.1 EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionTFTPServer a 192.0.2.1 EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionConfigFileName s EXAMPLE

description: The IP Address received from the DHCP server for this interface.
variables.name: EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionIpAddress

description: The Gateway Address received from the DHCP server for this interface.
variables.name: EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionGateway

description: The IP Address of the TFTP Server got from the DHCP Server.
variables.name: EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionTFTPServer

description: The Configuration file name got from the DHCP server which the Auto provision enabled switch will download from the TFTP Server and apply the same.
It can be with cfg or xsf extension.
variables.name: EXTREME-AUTOPROVISION-MIB::extremeAutoProvisionConfigFileName
